standalone-cluster
******************


Description
===========

Description of RoverCluster.


Available Commands
==================

* add-workload

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* delete-workload

* get-certificate

* list

* list-workloads

* request-approval

* rover-bundle

  * copy-to-customer

  * get-status

* rover-bundle-request

  * list

* rover-bundle-version

  * get

* set-secrets

* show

* update
